Uses of Interface
com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.IClientHandler

  • Packages that use IClientHandler 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.client
    Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with i2 Analyze through the supplied Java client.
    com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers
    Contains classes and interfaces that provide access to information that is communicated between the supplied Java client and i2 Analyze.
    com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation  

    • Uses of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client

      Method parameters in com.i2group.apollo.client with type arguments of type IClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IClientFactory ClientFactoryFactory.createClientFactory(String url, Iterable<? extends IClientHandler> connectionHandlers)
      Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the i2 Analyze deployment at the specified URL, using the specified IClientHandlers.

    • Uses of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers

      Subinterfaces of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IHTTPConnectionHandler
      A pair of methods that modify the HttpURLConnections between a client and the i2 Analyze document upload and download servlets.
      interface  ISOAPMessageHandler
      An extension of the standard Java SOAPHandler interface, for modifying the headers of SOAP messages between a client and the i2 Analyze web services.
      Classes in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers that implement IClientHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler
      A handler that adds HTTP headers that contain locale and time zone information to the requests that clients make to the i2 Analyze web service.
      class  LtpaAuthenticationHandler
      A handler that provides authentication functionality to the requests from a client to an i2 Analyze web service.

    • Uses of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation
